extracted.value: Appeal: SCOTT BESSENT, SERGIO GOR, KAREN GORMAN, KARL KAMMANN, DONALD J. TRUMP, RUSSELL VOUGHT appealed to DC Circuit Court.

evidence.text: It granted plaintiff’s motion for summary judgment on Count One of his complaint, ordered declaratory judgment and injunction relief

extracted.value: Granted plaintiff’s motion for summary judgment on Count One of his complaint; ordered declaratory judgment and injunction relief.

evidence.text: and denied defendants’ motion for summary judgment

extracted.value: Denied defendants’ motion for summary judgment.

evidence.text: defendants also filed a motion to stay the Court’s order pending appeal… The court … denied.

extracted.value: Denied defendants’ motion to stay the Court’s order pending appeal.

evidence.text: It granted plaintiff’s motion for summary judgment on Count One of his complaint, ordered declaratory judgment and injunction relief

extracted.value: Plaintiff filed a motion for summary judgment on Count One of his complaint, asking the court to decide the merits; granted on March 1, 2025.

evidence.text: and denied defendants’ motion for summary judgment

extracted.value: Defendants filed a motion for summary judgment, asking the court to decide the merits; denied on March 1, 2025.

evidence.text: defendants also filed a motion to stay the Court’s order pending appeal… The court … denied.

extracted.value: Defendants filed a motion to stay the Court’s order pending appeal, asking the court to stay the order; denied on March 1, 2025.

evidence.text: granting plaintiff’s motion for temporary restraining order [Dkt. # 14]

extracted.value: Plaintiff filed a motion for temporary restraining order, asking the court to issue a TRO; granted on March 1, 2025.

evidence.text: denying defendants’ motion to stay the temporary restraining order [Dkt. # 19]

extracted.value: Defendants filed a motion to stay the temporary restraining order, asking the court to stay the TRO; denied on March 1, 2025.
